short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For when you want your web browsing to have a bit more of a gothic flare to it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feeling the need to live a bit more in the 19th century? Looking for dark moors, secrets, libraries, and suitors that don't have your best interest at heart?
